Package Controller

Class AddAppointment

java.lang.Object
Controller.AddAppointment
public class AddAppointment extends Object
The `AddAppointment` class controls the UI for adding new appointments. It allows users to input appointment details and save them to the database.

      public void initialize() throws SQLException

    • populateContacts

      private void populateContacts() throws SQLException
      Populates the contact selection ComboBox. LAMBDA - acquires contactName from each contact in the list and adds it to the contactNameList
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while retrieving contact data.

    • populateCustomers

      public void AddAppSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Handles the action to save a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while saving the appointment.

    • getContactId

      public int getContactId(String contactName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the contact ID based on the contact name.
      Parameters:
      contactName - The name of the contact.
      Returns:
      The ID of the contact, or -1 if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while retrieving the contact ID.

    • getCustomerId

      public int getCustomerId(String customerName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the customer ID based on the customer name.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer.
      Returns:
      The ID of the customer, or -1 if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while retrieving the customer ID.

    • validateForm

      private boolean validateForm()
      Validates the appointment form data.
      Returns:
